name: Small Runner
description:
In the game you have been shrunk and put in a women's dormitory. You have to activate all the crystals and collect all the magnifying glasses. Then the reactor will appear, you have to find it to win.

The game is in early access. There are a lot of things to do, some bugs and outdated graphics. I'd like to get some feedback to understand in which direction to go.

Controls:

WASDQE - move;

Space - jump;

Left Shift - sprint;

Left Ctrl - walk;

B - open shop;

Middle Mouse Button - switch Firtst Person and Third Person camera view;

Esc - pause menu;

Assets:

Female models - by me, using Adobe Fuse

Female animation - me, using Mixamo

Dormitory and interior models - me, using Blender

Music - me;

Sound - Free asset from the Asset Store.
